Post-Match Reflections: Bryce Harper expressed optimism that the future is bright for the Philadelphia Phillies after their loss to the Arizona Diamondbacks in Game 7 of the National League Championship Series.

Harper said the Phillies will 'be back' because they have 'a great owner' and president of baseball operations Dave Dombrowski is 'going to get us the best opportunity to win and be here every single year'.
